item.title: Footpath and bridleway obliterated by ploughing, 28th August
item.description:
Footpath (which I believe is the "Gloucestershire Way") running SW, and bridleway running W from 967.304 to Woolstone Hill Farm are both obliterated. The footpath crosses 4 fields, all have been ploughed, and one has been planted with maize. No reintatement has been undertaken. There is no trace of the bridleway. Both footpath and bridleway I believe should run through the farm. The area is completely devoid of waymarks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sever lack of safety for cyclists, 28th August
item.description:
On all cycleway junctions with roads along this section of the A40 - Benhall gardens, Tennyson Road there is a significant safety risk for cyclists. Additional signage is required to make it clear to road and cycle user sof the priorities. There are almost daily regular accidents/ incidents at these junctions as cars coming onto and off of the A40 do not consider road markings and the raised surface which cyclists may be on. This is a dangerous issue that will soon result in severe harm to a cyclist.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Kingsley Gardens, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: The triangle and circle signs are obscured with dirt., 28th August
item.description:
Hello, the triangle (Level 3) and circle (Level 1) signs on approach to Coombe Hill traffic lights FROM Tewkesbury are obscured with dirt, and are difficult to see, especially from a distance on approach on the bend. Would it be possible for them to be cleaned please ? They are the speed limit and traffic light signs. Thankyou !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large weeds growing on pavement and curb side, 28th August
item.description:
The weeds are worst outside 67 Shearwater Grove, GL3 1DD. The whole of the road has an issue with weeds along the curb side. This has been going on for a few years with no one coming out to clear the weeds.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shearwater Grove, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
